DESCRIPTION:

Sister game heroine was arrested on false charges, she herself had been outlawed. 
City-utopia, where she lives, was at the mercy of the police, armed to the teeth. 
All phones tapped, all the talk over the Internet are reviewed, so the only way 
to send a message secretly - to entrust an experienced courier delivery. 
Such as you.

You - a courier named Faith. And in this game will be told your story.
Runs on industrial urban landscapes, rapid chases and fierce 
battles - that's what life heroine Mirror's Edge. Unique model 
of movement and perspective will allow you to immerse your head 
in the world of Faith. Cruel, ruthless and unforgiving world.

Life or death? Fall or rise? One thing is certain - this city will 
teach you to run.Meet the new game from the creators of the Battlefield 
series a unique action adventure Mirror's Edge. 

Mirror's Edge Pure Time Trials Map Pack - this is the only released DLC 
for the game, containing a set of 7 cards.
